extension.description:
CouchPotato is an automatic NZB and torrent downloader. You can keep a movies I want list and it will search for NZBs/torrents of these movies every X hours. Once a movie is found, it will send it to SABnzbd or download the torrent to a specified directory.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.couchpotato: -------------------------------
2.0.1 - Kodi Nexus compatibility: remove `os.libreelec.tv` dependency
2.0.0 - kodi matrix compatibility - use docker container name instead kodi add-on id
1.0.5 - Use docker image updater for image updates (faster startup on boot) - Use the custom lsio docker network for intercontainer communication via containername as hostname - Switch to multi-arch builds
1.0.4 - Fix timezone bug
1.0.3 - Added aarch64 support
1.0.2 - Run as user nobody
1.0.1 - Unified addon for x86_64 and arm
1.0.0 - Initial release

extension.description:
Deluge is a lightweight, Free Software, cross-platform BitTorrent client.
- Full Encryption - WebUI - Plugin System - Much more...
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.deluge: --------------------------------
2.0.1 - Kodi Nexus compatibility: remove `os.libreelec.tv` dependency
2.0.0 - kodi matrix compatibility - use docker container name instead kodi add-on id
1.0.0 - Initial release

extension.description:
Grocy is an ERP system for your kitchen! Cut down on food waste, and manage your chores with this brilliant utulity.
Keep track of your purchaes, how much food you are wasting, what chores need doing and what batteries need charging with this proudly Open Source tool
For more information on grocy visit their website and check it out: https://grocy.info
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.grocy: --------------------------
2.0.1 - Kodi Nexus compatibility: remove `os.libreelec.tv` dependency
2.0.0 - kodi matrix compatibility - use docker container name instead kodi add-on id
1.0.0 -Initial release

extension.description:
API Support for your favorite torrent trackers
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.

docker.linuxserver.jackett: --------------------------------
2.0.0 - Initial release, copied from docker.linuxserver.transmission

extension.description:
Lidarr is a music collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new tracks from your favorite artists and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.lidarr: --------------------------
2.0.1 - Kodi Nexus compatibility: remove `os.libreelec.tv` dependency
2.0.0 - kodi matrix compatibility - use docker container name instead kodi add-on id
1.0.0 -Initial release

extension.description:
Medusa is an automatic Video Library Manager for TV Shows. It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows, and when they are posted it does its magic.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.medusa: -------------------------------
2.0.1 - Kodi Nexus compatibility: remove `os.libreelec.tv` dependency
2.0.0 - kodi matrix compatibility - use docker container name instead kodi add-on id
1.0.0 - Initial release

extension.description:
NZBGet is a usenet downloader, written in C++ and designed with performance in mind to achieve maximum download speed by using very little system resources.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
Default user:pass are nzbget:tegbzn6789 (Change ASAP)
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.nzbget: --------------------------
2.0.1 - Kodi Nexus compatibility: remove `os.libreelec.tv` dependency
2.0.0 - kodi matrix compatibility - use docker container name instead kodi add-on id
1.0.5 - Use docker image updater for image updates (faster startup on boot) - Use the custom lsio docker network for intercontainer communication via containername as hostname - Switch to multi-arch builds
1.0.4 - Fix timezone bug
1.0.3 - Added aarch support
1.0.2 - Change user to nobody
1.0.1 - Unified addon for x86_64 and arm
1.0.0 - Initial release

extension.description:
SABnzbd makes Usenet as simple and streamlined as possible by automating everything we can. All you have to do is add an .nzb. SABnzbd takes over from there, where it will be automatically downloaded, verified, repaired, extracted and filed away with zero human interaction.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.sabnzbd: ---------------------------
2.0.1 - Kodi Nexus compatibility: remove `os.libreelec.tv` dependency
2.0.0 - kodi matrix compatibility - use docker container name instead kodi add-on id
1.0.5 - Use docker image updater for image updates (faster startup on boot) - Use the custom lsio docker network for intercontainer communication via containername as hostname - Switch to multi-arch builds
1.0.4 - Fix timezone bug
1.0.3 - Added aarch64 support
1.0.2 - Run as user nobody
1.0.1 - Unified addon for x86_64 and arm
1.0.0 - Initial release

extension.description:
Sonarr (formerly NZBdrone) is a PVR for usenet and bittorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.

extension.description:
Taisun is an application for a Docker enabled device with an emphasis on providing a web based interface for managing a single server. Taisun allows you to:
Deploy and manage web based virtual desktops. Deploy Taisun specific stacks of applications Browse available images on popular Docker repositories Import a Docker project from any git repository and start developing on your choice of web based IDE or full Linux desktop Spinup a developer container based on popular frameworks and work from a web based IDE Single click remote server access to Taisun and your Docker applications
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.taisun: --------------------------
2.0.1 - Kodi Nexus compatibility: remove `os.libreelec.tv` dependency
2.0.0 - kodi matrix compatibility - use docker container name instead kodi add-on id
1.0.0 -Initial release

extension.description:
Transmission is designed for easy, powerful use. Transmission has the features you want from a BitTorrent client: encryption, a web interface, peer exchange, magnet links, DHT, µTP, UPnP and NAT-PMP port forwarding, webseed support, watch directories, tracker editing, global and per-torrent speed limits, and more.
This is a docker container brought to you by the LinuxServer.io team. Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
extension.news:
docker.linuxserver.transmission: -------------------------------- 2.0.2 - Allow setting up a webui from a local directory
2.0.1 - Kodi Nexus compatibility: remove `os.libreelec.tv` dependency
2.0.0 - kodi matrix compatibility - use docker container name instead kodi add-on id
1.0.3 - Use docker image updater for image updates (faster startup on boot) - Use the custom lsio docker network for intercontainer communication via containername as hostname - Added web interface settings - Switch to multi-arch builds
1.0.2 - Fix timezone bug
1.0.1 - Added aarch64 support
1.0.0 - Initial release

extension.summary: Install add-ons from LinuxServer.io's docker repository

Download and install docker container add-ons from the LinuxServer.io repository. This is the extended repo.
Please visit https://linuxserver.io for more information.
